translation: Tohụ̄ kriv ʿrẓ zi bh chuhs (sarine) ansann hndis rb sund pnah mngan.
Vsvsh travan vạlis (shyṭan) sndi shr nishhi yus (Allah tʿālyā snzi dhkri hndi athr sintụ̄) pth czlith khttith rvzn vvl chuh.
Yus lukn hndyn diln mnz vsvsh travan chuh.
Khvah suh (vsvsh travan vvl shyṭan) jinv mnz ạsụ̄tn ya ansanv mnz.
